div.div:
LJH - March 22, 2012 - Version 7.0
Great wallpaper (Galaxy Nexus)
I'd pay even twice as much for it. Only small issue I have is the compatibility w/ Go Launcher (I think). When you wrap around from the 'first' home panel to the 'last', the wallpaper doesn't readjust its position properly. Developer: I can provided a better explanation if you're interested. Not a big deal though.

Adam - June 3, 2012 - HTC Sensation 4G with version 7.0
Old but great!
Even though it hasn't been updated in months I bought it anyways...so perfect. It can be entrancing yet non intrusive.

Christopher - January 29, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S with version 7.0
Wow
A Beautiful and simplistic design. Very functional and customizable while its simplicity causes almost zero lag. Excellent work, dev!

victor - January 29, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 7.0
Best of the best
This wallpaper looks great, has tons of customizable options and has minimal impact on battery life. Love it..

Jjr - July 1, 2012 - Motorola Atrix with version 7.0
Nice!!
I'm loving this LWP! Took me abit to get the colors the way I wanted, as they would go back to default. But I got them set. Great to have different colors & speed variations. Hope there will be a Mystic Halo 2 someday soon!

Mike - March 4, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 7.0
Ultimate cool. Puts all others to shame.
This is by far the coolest and most awesome LWP available period. Nothing else even comes close. To the developer, touche you're a legend man.

Ernie - December 27, 2011 - HTC G2 with version 7.0
Had to pay for this. It's beautiful. I use it all the time. Doesn't ...
Had to pay for this. It's beautiful. I use it all the time. Doesn't affect battery life. HTC G2 w/ CM7.1

Kurt - April 24, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 7.0
Awesome!
Very simple, which is great! Not too busy, and looks awesome. Galaxy Nexus

Bill - June 26, 2012 - Acer Picasso with version 7.0
Super cool
Awesome design, looks like Tron meets Star Wars. But no longer can center it on my Razor Maxx screen after ICS update. Same with Acer A100. Please fix!

Skye - January 30, 2012 - EeePad Transformer TF101 with version 7.0
Very nice!
This is a beautiful and attractive live wallpaper. It looks good, and is not very flashy or obtrusive. However, there's something about it that seems to impede system performance that should be looked into. Perhaps implementing OpenGL might help improve performance. Even with this, it's still my wallpaper of choice!

Don - December 30, 2011 - HTC Wildfire S with version 7.0
Awesome!
This is a fantastic wallpaper and I would buy more from you if you developed them.

sevenalive - June 12, 2012 - EeePad Transformer TF300 with version 7.0
Great but needs more
On my tablet with a Tegra3 sometimes it stutters and stalls on 4.03. It also caused launcher to crash. Seems to slow down my tablet and I have it spinning slowly.

STARSCREAM - February 21, 2012 - HTC Evo 4G with version 7.0
Chris u r stupid!!
It's beautiful. I made it into a rainbow and its perfect. Easy to use settings!!! Thanks A+++

Eric - January 21, 2012 - HTC Incredible 2 with version 7.0
cannot reinstall it
i have not found out how to reinstall this after my phone has been put back to factory settings, all it says on this page is purchased and installed on my phone already, but it is not on it anymore

Shawn - December 28, 2011 - Version 7.0
Stunning!
The neon red looks great and matches my HTC Rezound's red light up keys.

Joseph - December 30, 2011 - LG Optimus One with version 7.0
very nice indeed
this is a great super low resource live wallpaper, I use it everyday on my lg optimus v..

Sam - December 31, 2011 - HTC EVO 3D with version 7.0
Perfect Live Wallpaper!
I saw this a while ago when I was on my old Hero and I fell in love. Couldn't run it then, but now that I have an EVO 3D, this runs very well! No noticeable drain on battery like stock Live Wallpapers.

iFargle - December 24, 2011 - Motorola Atrix with version 7.0
Love it.
First wallpaper I've paid for. Worth the dollar. It looks amazing!

James - April 1, 2012 - Motorola Atrix with version 7.0
Simply amazing
Downloaded this app when I first got my phone, haven't changed it since. Love the constant updates, love the low performance hit, and definitely love the looks. Simply amazing.

E. - December 6, 2011 - HTC Evo 4G with version 7.0
I love the design of this wallpaper and the color options. 4 stars because ...
I love the design of this wallpaper and the color options. 4 stars because I have to reset the background back to this every time my phone is reset.

Eric - December 5, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S with version 7.0
Thank you.
Bought this just in preparation for the GN! By far one of the top live wallpapers around!

Jason - December 7, 2011 - HTC Sensation 4G with version 7.0
Very cool background, and It works well except for the color change feature. The ...
Very cool background, and It works well except for the color change feature. The wallpaper completely freezes up on me when I try to change the color.

Human - December 23, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 7.0
Pure awesome
So many configuration options and very low CPU usage for the amount of high tech eye candy. Support this device so s/he can make more wonders.

Jamie - February 9, 2012 - HTC Evo 4G with version 7.0
Different
Love it, looks great on my evo 4G! Got the paid version for a buck, rich with options!

Jordan - February 12, 2012 - EeePad Transformer TF101 with version 7.0
Great
Used the free version for a while, still love it. bought this to support dev. Recommend! Asus TF101

Malaeus - January 24, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 7.0
Great app. Would love to see some extras
Would love to be able to recolor rings based on Current battery power.

oshane - February 26, 2012 - Samsung Admire with version 7.0
Great!
Its Good But Does Anybody Know The Name For That Word Clock Widget?

Fantastic

Mike - March 21, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Note with version 7.0
Gorgeous on Samsung Note
Thanks for saving me from the garbage they included on my phone. HD option looks fantastic on the large screen.

Charlie - February 28, 2012 - Samsung Stratosphere with version 7.0
Fantastic!
Really the only livepaper I've seen worth getting. Simple and subdued. If it used RGB for custom colors and not Hue and Sat, I would be totally stoked!

Zach - December 7, 2011 - HTC Incredible S with version 7.0
Free is fine. The paid one won't spin. (Yes I've configured the settings so ...
Free is fine. The paid one won't spin. (Yes I've configured the settings so it should spin) if anyone has a set of settings that really work plz say.

Lando - March 4, 2012 - Motorola XOOM with version 7.0
Awesome app
Only bought it because of the dog and the captions and I hate dogs lol

Gary - January 3, 2012 - Version 7.0
Great Live Wallpapper
Tried the free version before I paid for the full version. Full version adds much more customization. Looks awesome and runs smooth with minimal battery usage. HTC Amaze 4G

Leonel - March 27, 2012 - HTC Sensation 4G with version 7.0
Low rating
Because will not fit on my screen HTC sensation, and keeps force closing..

Crest - April 20, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 7.0
Epic
This would be my first rating. I don't rate anything but I can see the work that has been put into this so I had to say something. I too love a good art work. Everything is how its promised to be being basic yet somewhat have complexity as will a bring very light. Live it. Good work on making this mate.

Carl - December 17, 2011 - Motorola Photon 4G with version 7.0
looks great
Everything works as it should for me... hoping for additional multicolor presets.

Looks great on rezound. Lots of options. No permissions needed.

Awesome

Dave - January 10, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 7.0
Wow!

Great LWP I got the trial then got the paid for the options SUPER ...

.

Nightwolf - March 2, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 7.0

Very pleased with the quality of this little app. Will not hesitate to buy other offerings by this chap.

Thomas - April 13, 2012 - Version 7.0
Would be 5
I love the app, bought the pro version, but would be a 5 to give more fade options. But overall, well done!

cameron - February 13, 2012 - Version 7.0
Kinda noticing..
It may lag up on rotation minimally on my s2, put it in hd mode although my screen isn't hd. It said in description put hd so it knows it's not a tablet...idk

thomas - January 5, 2012 - Motorola Droid X with version 7.0
Wtf

div.div:
Michael - May 18, 2012 - Galaxy S2 Skyrocket
Very clean and simple
Clean, simple, smooth-moving wallpaper. Good buy at only a dollar.

Steve - December 8, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus
Superb and practical
I love the digital blasphemy art and this is a great conversion of it into a live wall paper. It's very practical too and has just the right level of 'liveness' to make it look cool but not be annoying in day to day use. The configuration options are great too. I have Galaxy Nexus and it works perfectly.

Jack - September 5, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S with version 1.0
Jack
Baller

div.h4: Excellent lwp from an excellent dev

div.p: This lwp looks amazing and has no noticeable performance or battery hit on your phone, and the dev is great at responding to questions and requests!

div.h4: Finally, what I've been looking for.

div.p: Very nice, subdued, yet cool live wallpaper. Doesn't slow down my Galaxy Nexus. Well done.

Very nice live wallpaper. So many configuration options. If only performance was a little better I would give it 6 stars. It causes a little of stuttering (nothing major) while changing homescreens on my Galaxy. Nexus.
